scripts.cypress:run: cypress run --spec ./cypress/integration/**/*.spec.ts --config-file ./cypress/cypress.json --reporter ../../node_modules/cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=./cypress/reporter_config.json; status=$?; ../../node_modules/.bin/mochawesome-merge --reportDir ../../../target/kibana-siem/cypress/results > ../../../target/kibana-siem/cypress/results/output.json; ../../../node_modules/.bin/marge ../../../target/kibana-siem/cypress/results/output.json --reportDir ../../../target/kibana-siem/cypress/results; mkdir -p ../../../target/junit && cp ../../../target/kibana-siem/cypress/results/*.xml ../../../target/junit/ && exit $status;
